attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every day the A453 has traffic at a stand-still for miles - this is NOT good for the environment. It is also a waste of people's time and lives. It is the main A road off the motorway into Nottingham. This, and the A46 dualling, are long overdue. Could they just be widened in places, instead of having to have a huge new motorway-style dual carriageway built?
